title: Malignant neoplasm: Overlapping lesion of biliary tract
category: Malignant neoplasm of other and unspecified parts of biliary tract
inclusion: Malignant neoplasm involving both intrahepatic and extrahepatic bile ducts
Malignant neoplasm of biliary tract whose point of origin cannot be classified to any one of the categories C22.0-C24.1
